025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.handlerlist;
026
027import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
028
029import java.util.Objects;
030
031/**
032 * An interface to set the listener's priority.
033 */
034@FunctionalInterface
035public interface Priority extends Comparable<Priority> {
036
037    /**
038     * Priority: -128
039     */
040    Priority LOWEST = of(-128);
041
042    /**
043     * Priority: -64
044     */
045    Priority LOW = of(-64);
046
047    /**
048     * Priority: 0
049     */
050    Priority NORMAL = of(0);
051
052    /**
053     * Priority: 64
054     */
055    Priority HIGH = of(64);
056
057    /**
058     * Priority: 128
059     */
060    Priority HIGHEST = of(128);
061
062    /**
063     * Creates a new priority.
064     *
065     * @param value the priority value
066     * @return the priority
067     */
068    static @NotNull Priority of(int value) {
069        return new PriorityImpl(value);
070    }
071
072    /**
073     * Gets the priority value.
074     *
075     * @return the priority value
076     */
077    int getPriority();
078
079    @Override
080    default int compareTo(@NotNull Priority other) {
081        Objects.requireNonNull(other);
082        return Integer.compare(this.getPriority(), other.getPriority());
083    }
084}
